channel.title: New tokhaar kal cape?
channel.description: Hi im in matrix source and i was wondering how i can update the old looks of tokhaar kal to the new looks with the lava look running down the back?

item.title: New tokhaar kal cape?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“AssassinsCRB, post:9, topic:459207”]Ik how to do all of it now i think except the ukeys, this is what cachedownloader.java looks like for me: http://gyazo.com/e97a4ab2c217fefee7ebaea73d165b41
also thanks for being so helpful :D, so basically i do the ukey stuff then i download the runescape cache, i take it and the matrix cache and go into the packer and open packcache.bat then select the matrix cache and then select the rs cache and then use the cache i get in matrix?[/quote]

Hold ‘ctrl a’ then ‘ctrl c’ then open wordpad and do ‘ctrl v’ then do ‘ctrl a’ then ‘ctrl c’ then close wordpad without saving. Open up the CacheDownloader.java file with notepad and do ‘ctrl a’ then ‘ctrl v’ and ‘ctrl s’ and close + compile.

Read full topic

item.title: New tokhaar kal cape?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

AssassinsCRB:

Sorry i’m pretty retarded lol but what are u keys :o

You’re not retarded, you’re new

‘uKeys’ is data that the client requests for the update server.

Quote from Peterbjornx:

What “uKeys” really are

Infact what you call uKeys are a file consisting of the CRC32’s and revision ids of the File Information Tables in cache255, format

Header:

BYTE : Cache (needs to be 255)
SHORT : File (needs to be 255)
BYTE : Compression (needs to be 0 (uncompressed))
DWORD : Length ( the total length of the data block)

Data block:

DWORD : FIT CRC32
DWORD : FIT Revision (0 if FIT is format version 5)

So size of “uKeys” = (numCaches * 8) + 5

Here’s how to get the current uKeys that you’re downloading:
http://rune-serv*r.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/255566-how-make-methods-cache-downloader-print-ukeys.html
(Replace the * with e - when doing this, make sure you’ve compiled).

I would do it for you, but I don’t want to wait half an hour for the cache to download.

Read full topic

item.title: New tokhaar kal cape?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Download this: http://www.mediafire.com/?rr0g57x8paaewts
The topic that download is from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449072.0.html

Run it and the cache should output in a folder. Download a cache packer (http://www.mediafire.com/?evhpisqbsm1wkah - All credits to Chris_ on Rune-Server) and pack the original 667 cache that came with Matrix with the new cache from the output folder in the cache downloader. You also need to update your uKeys or something like that…

Read full topic
